alert.note: Alert for Butler; Colfax (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 3:47AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is occurring. * WHERE...Portions of east central Nebraska and northeast Nebraska, including the following counties, in east central Nebraska, Butler. In northeast Nebraska, Colfax. * WHEN...Until noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low lying areas near the river will continue through this morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 347 AM CST, Emergency management reported an ice jam on the Platte River near Schuyler. The jam is located about 2 miles downstream from the Highway 15 bridge. This is causing some flooding on the south side of the river in Butler County. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Butler and Southeastern Colfax Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
